TEXT.TITLE: FREDDIE MAC ADJUSTS SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT RATES
TEXT.BODY:
The Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 28 days 5.95 pct 5.95 pct 31 days
Reuter
